title: Use uploaded image-9.png as GreenPlantz logo across header, footer, and favicon

requirements.summary: Add image-9.png to generated static assets and create a 112px-tall transparent, header-optimized, cache-busted logo PNG derived from it.
acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the original uploaded file under frontend/public/assets/generated/ (image-9.png).
A new derived logo PNG exists under frontend/public/assets/generated/ with a cache-busting filename and 112px height, transparent background preserved where applicable.
The derived logo PNG renders correctly when loaded directly via /assets/generated/<filename>.

file_operations.description: Add the original uploaded image as a static asset (must be exactly named image-9.png) under frontend/public/assets/generated/.

Create a header-optimized, transparent PNG derived from frontend/public/assets/generated/image-9.png at exactly 112px height (preserve aspect ratio; no distortion; no extra padding unless needed to avoid clipping).

requirements.summary: Update the site header logo to use the new cache-busted derived 112px-tall logo asset.
acceptanceCriteria: The header logo remains responsive and does not overflow the header height (header container is h-16), maintaining aspect ratio.

file_operations.description: Replace the current logo src ("/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png") with "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-image-9.dim_auto_x112.cb_20260209_01.png" and keep responsive sizing within the h-16 header.

requirements.summary: Update the site footer brand logo to use the new cache-busted derived 112px-tall logo asset.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer brand logo displays correctly on mobile and desktop layouts.

file_operations.description: Replace the current footer brand logo src ("/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png") with "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-image-9.dim_auto_x112.cb_20260209_01.png" while preserving existing responsive layout behavior.

requirements.summary: Generate new cache-busted favicon assets from image-9.png and update index.html to reference them.
acceptanceCriteria: New favicon files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and are referenced in frontend/index.html.
A hard refresh shows the updated favicon in the browser tab (no broken favicon requests in the network panel).

file_operations.description: Generate a 16x16 PNG favicon derived from frontend/public/assets/generated/image-9.png with a cache-busting filename.
Generate a 32x32 PNG favicon derived from frontend/public/assets/generated/image-9.png with a cache-busting filename.
Generate an .ico favicon derived from frontend/public/assets/generated/image-9.png with a cache-busting filename.

Update favicon link references to replace /assets/generated/favicon.cb_20260209.ico, /assets/generated/favicon-32x32.cb_20260209.png, and /assets/generated/favicon-16x16.cb_20260209.png with /assets/generated/favicon.cb_20260209_01.ico, /assets/generated/favicon-32x32.cb_20260209_01.png, and /assets/generated/favicon-16x16.cb_20260209_01.png.

requirements.summary: Remove remaining references to the previous GreenPlantz logo asset(s) and update them to the new cache-busted logo so it appears consistently everywhere.
acceptanceCriteria: No references remain to "/assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png" in the frontend source after the change.
All brand-logo instances in the UI use the new cache-busted asset path(s).

file_operations.description: Re-scan for any remaining references to older GreenPlantz logo assets under /assets/generated/ and ensure the header uses only /assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-image-9.dim_auto_x112.cb_20260209_01.png.

Re-scan for any remaining references to older GreenPlantz logo assets under /assets/generated/ and ensure the footer uses only /assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-image-9.dim_auto_x112.cb_20260209_01.png.

Verify there are no remaining references to older favicon or logo asset filenames under /assets/generated/ (including /assets/generated/greenplantz-logo-untitled-design.dim_112x112.cb_20260209.png) and keep only the new cache-busted favicon references.
